Reason: The configuration 'cas_contention_timeout_in_ms' is performance-sensitive. The code context shows that this configuration directly impacts the timeout duration for retrying CAS operations that contend with other proposals. The 'DatabaseDescriptor.getCasContentionTimeout(NANOSECONDS)' method is used to obtain the value of this configuration, which is crucial for determining how long the system waits before giving up on resolving contentions. The timeout duration directly affects the performance of CAS operations by influencing the frequency and duration of retries, which can significantly impact system performance at the operational level.
